name: Suspicious Diantz Download and Compress Into a CAB File
description: Download and compress a remote file and store it in a cab file on local machine.
note: **Detection Rule without Regex for better understanding. Be careful, this way is case sensitive:**`(process.command_line:*diantz.exe* AND process.command_line:*\ \\\\\* AND process.command_line:*.cab*)`
